trans-unit.source: Metadata Interface for all CLR types types
trans-unit.target: 所有 CLR 型別的中繼資料介面

trans-unit.source: No content here will be updated; please do not add material here.
trans-unit.target: 沒有要更新的內容，請不要在這裡新增資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderManifest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbProviderManifest" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Value to pass to GetInformation to get the ConceptualSchemaDefinitionVersion.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 GetInformation 以取得 ConceptualSchemaDefinitionVersion 的值。

trans-unit.source: Value to pass to GetInformation to get the ConceptualSchemaDefinitionVersion3.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 GetInformation 以取得 ConceptualSchemaDefinitionVersion3 的值。

trans-unit.source: The argument to be escaped.
trans-unit.target: 要逸出的引數。

trans-unit.source: Provider writers should override this method to return the argument with the wildcards and the escape character escaped.
trans-unit.target: 提供者寫入器應該覆寫這個方法，以傳回包含逸出之萬用字元和逸出字元的引數。

trans-unit.source: This method is only used if SupportsEscapingLikeArgument returns true.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 SupportsEscapingLikeArgument 傳回 true，才能使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The argument with the wildcards and the escape character escaped.
trans-unit.target: 包含逸出之萬用字元和逸出字元的引數。

trans-unit.source: The type of the information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的資訊類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method returns provider-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法會傳回提供者特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The XmlReader object that represents the mapping to the underlying data store catalog.
trans-unit.target: XmlReader 物件，表示與基礎資料存放區目錄的對應。

trans-unit.source: The TypeUsage instance that describes a storage type and a set of facets for that type to be mapped to the EDM type.
trans-unit.target: TypeUsage 執行個體，描述要對應到 EDM 型別的儲存區類型和該類型的一組 Facet。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method maps the specified storage type and a set of facets for that type to an EDM type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法會將指定的儲存區類型和該類型的一組 Facet 對應到 EDM 型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage" /> instance that describes an EDM type and a set of facets for that type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage" /> 執行個體，描述 EDM 型別和該型別的一組 Facet。

trans-unit.source: The EDM type to return the facet description for.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回 Facet 描述的 EDM 型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the FacetDescription objects for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回特定型別的 FacetDescription 物件。

trans-unit.source: The FacetDescription objects for the specified EDM type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 EDM 型別的 FacetDescription 物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的資訊類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the provider-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供者特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The provider-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 提供者特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a collection of EDM functions supported by the provider manifest.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回由提供者資訊清單支援的 EDM 函式集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of EDM functions.
trans-unit.target: EDM 函式的集合。

trans-unit.source: The TypeUsage instance that describes the EDM type and a set of facets for that type to be mapped to a storage type.
trans-unit.target: TypeUsage 執行個體，描述要對應到儲存區類型的 EDM 型別和該型別的一組 Facet。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method maps the specified EDM type and a set of facets for that type to a storage type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法會將指定的 EDM 型別和該型別的一組 Facet 對應到儲存區類型。

trans-unit.source: The TypeUsage instance that describes a storage type and a set of facets for that type.
trans-unit.target: TypeUsage 執行個體，描述儲存區類型和該類型的一組 Facet。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the set of primitive types supported by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回資料來源所支援的一組基本型別。

trans-unit.source: The set of types supported by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源支援的一組型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace used by this provider manifest.
trans-unit.target: 取得此提供者資訊清單使用的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The namespace used by this provider manifest.
trans-unit.target: 此提供者資訊清單使用的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Value to pass to GetInformation to get the StoreSchemaDefinitionVersion.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 GetInformation 以取得 StoreSchemaDefinitionVersion 的值。

trans-unit.source: Value to pass to GetInformation to get the StoreSchemaDefinitionVersion3.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 GetInformation 以取得 StoreSchemaDefinitionVersion3 的值。

trans-unit.source: Value to pass to GetInformation to get the StoreSchemaMappingVersion.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 GetInformation 以取得 StoreSchemaMappingVersion 的值。

trans-unit.source: Value to pass to GetInformation to get the StoreSchemaMappingVersion3.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 GetInformation 以取得 StoreSchemaMappingVersion3 的值。

trans-unit.source: If the provider supports escaping, the character that would be used as the escape character.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者支援逸出，則該字元會做為逸出字元使用。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the provider supports escaping strings to be used as patterns in a Like expression.
trans-unit.target: 指出提供者是否支援將逸出字串做為 Like 運算式中的模式使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if this provider supports escaping strings to be used as patterns in a Like expression; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個提供者支援將逸出字串做為 Like 運算式中的模式使用，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
